name: Jana Kaun
background: Jana Kaun serves as Commissioning Editor, Factual Entertainment at ProSiebenSat.1. Focus areas: Factual entertainment, social experiments.
thematic_priorities: Social experiment formats about contemporary German society
Access documentaries into institutions or communities with young appeal
True crime series with unique storytelling approach
Science programming with experimental elements and young presenter
format_specifications: Both series and one-off, depending on story and slot
3-10 episodes for series, depending on strand
budget_parameters: Documentary: €80K–€200K per hour; Specialist Factual: €100K–€200K per hour
technical_requirements: Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
submission_process: One-page outline with headline, premise and format
Talent attachments focused on younger presenters
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach; Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; Encouragement of sustainable production practices; Open to pitches from independent producers/companies.
